page.title: 05Religion
page.content: Mr. Hardy is the vicar of the Parish of St James' Riding Mill.The most important work of Mr. Hardy is having church services and praying for everyone everyday. He baptises young babies and marries people. Mr. Hardy holds funerals and later he visits the relatives of the person who has just died and comforts them. He goes to visit people who are sick and talks to the old people as well. Every month he writes the Parish News and every two months he writes the Deanery Digest. The Rev. Malcolm Adams is the Minister of the Methodist Chapel in Riding Mill but he lives in Wylam. The Roman Catholics of the Parish attend Mass at Minsteracres.
